## slu k8s get bad-pods

Get bad pods (all pods without them with Phase in: Running, Succeeded

```
slu k8s get bad-pods [flags]
```

### Options

```

  -h, --help               help for bad-pods
  -n, --namespace string   Kubernetes Namespace
```
